column2: plot3<-ggplot(df_country, aes(x = country, y = n, fill = country)) + geom_col() + geom_text(aes(label = n),hjust = +0.7, colour = "black") + coord_flip() + theme(legend.position = "top", text = element_text (size = 15))#bar graphs numbers of cabezas tractoras for every country

plot4<-ggplot(df_country, aes(x = country, y = mean_years, colour = country)) + geom_point()  + coord_flip() + theme(legend.position='none') #bar graphs edad promedio of cabezas tractoras for every country
